channel.title: Server status checker

item.title: Server status checker
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Hey guys, I need help on my website… i’m trying to add a server status checker for other people to check to see if their RSPS is online. I will show you the php and html codes. Sorry if this is the wrong section, I wasn’t sure.

My PHP code:

<? $ip = "ip"; $port = "port"; if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5)) echo '<B><FONT COLOR=red>Online</b></FONT>'; else{ echo '<B><FONT COLOR=lime>Offline</b></FONT>'; fclose($sock); } ?>

My HTML code:

[code]


Server IP:
Server Port: <input type="text" name="port"

[/code]

Help is appriciated! Rep++ for someone helping me!
Thanks!

Read full topic
